page.title: 06Finedon The Hall
page.content: The old chapel at Finedon Hall has been converted into a home.We interviewed one of the people who live there.She said that when work started, the chapel was just a shell,with more nests in than the trees outside.There was no drainage,water,electricity or even a fireplace.It was only after looking at many drawings that they finally decided what to do. One of the reasons they love their home is the carved blackbirds and leaves on the old ironstone columns at the front. Their garden is the old kitchen garden of the Hall and the soil is very rich as much of it was carted in from the fens by the Squires of Finedon. They hope that the rest of the Hall will be turned into flats as they would like some neighbours.
